Distancing isn't Needed

Distancing isn’t Needed {#h.tjtvy5b0ayvs .zfr3Q .duRjpb dir=”ltr” style=”text-align: center;”}

Only 304 US prisoner deaths through May 6, although prisoners locked up like sardines!

2.3 million US prisoners 80%+ C19 positive!!!

US prisoner death rate still ½ the US civilian unconstitutional lockdown C19 death rate.

\

WHY AREN’T PRISONERS DYING LIKE CRAZY?

\

Because C19 doesn’t kill young and healthy without pre-existing risks and comorbidities.

Lockdowns don’t work.
